Interests

During my journey of generating interest for Automation, i realized Learning can be so much fun when you have genuine interest. Now my goal is to learn new languages and make some fun projects, which i assumed would be impossible for me before.

My interest before learning to code were around the world of anime and gaming. i enjoy reading light novels when i have enough free time, It just amazes me how can these authors think of such intruging world and concepts, makes me feel motivated to create something that never existed before.
